title.full: A Day at Gmas House in Winter
title.reduced: A Day at Gmas House in Winter

description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Watch your child spend the day at grandma's house in the winter, as they sled down the mountain, skate on the ice pond, catch snowflakes, or simply make a special picture for their favorite person.  Simple games designed for your young child's entertainment.
description.short: Watch your child spend the day at grandma's house in the winter, as they sled down the mountain, skate on the ice pond, catch snowflakes, or simply make a special picture for their favorite person.  Simple games designed for your young child's entertainment.
